Class Draughts

  • java.lang.Object
    • draughts.controller.Draughts

  • public class Draughts
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class - part of the CONTROLLER component in a MVC pattern for this application.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • startGUI

        public static void startGUI()
        Starts the main Draughts Window GUI.
        Displayed board: empty International draughts board.

      • startGUI

        public static void startGUI(GameType gameType)
        Starts the main Draughts Window GUI.
        Displayed board: an empty board of type gameType.
        Parameters:
        gameType - : the type of the draughts game.

      • startGUI

        public static void startGUI(PDN pdnGameData)
        Starts the main Draughts Window GUI.
        Parameters:
        pdnGameData: - gameData - a PDN object containing pertinent informations for the game:
        Event, Site, Date, Round, White, Black, [Result], gameType, [FEN]

      • newMatch

        public static void newMatch()

      • changeGame

        public static void changeGame(GameType gameType)
        Relays user's choice to change the type of game to play.
        Parameters:
        gameType - : the gameType

      • loadFile

        public static void loadFile()
        Loads a draughts match from an existing file in pdn format.

      • saveFile

        public static void saveFile()
        Saves a draughts match into a file, encoding is in pdn format.
        File overwriting is not allowed.

      • quit

        public static void quit()

      • undoMove

        public static void undoMove()

      • displayLabels

        public static void displayLabels(boolean displayLabels)
        Relays user's choice to display/hide square labels.
        Parameters:
        displayLabels - : boolean, display square labels if true.

      • changeFrameSize

        public static void changeFrameSize(MainFrameSize ratio)
        Relays user's choice to change the size of the main frame.
        Parameters:
        ratio - : A MainFrameSize parameter encoding the size of the main frame in relation to screen size.
